summary: A command‑line utility that loads a NeMo ASR hybrid model (.nemo), extracts either its CTC or RNNT sub‑model, and saves the extracted component as a standalone CTC or RNNT .nemo model for downstream use.
business_intent: Facilitate the workflow of training hybrid ASR models while allowing easy deployment of pure CTC or RNNT models, thereby simplifying integration with NeMo‑based pipelines and NVIDIA Riva services.
